Service.Title: EIDORS field solver
Service.Description: Compute extracellular potentials from an EIDORS mesh

Inputs.Name: file.mat
Inputs.Label: EIDORS mesh
Inputs.Description: Input eidors mesh, such as that generated by "Peripheral Neural Interface Mesher"

Inputs.Name: conductivity.json
Inputs.Label: optional conductivities
Inputs.Description: JSON document containing conductivities for each region in the EIDORS mesh

Outputs.Name: extracellular-potential.mat
Outputs.Label: computed extracellular potential
Outputs.Description: eidors mesh and v_extracellular as a nodes x channels matrix of potentials for a unit stimulus
